display_name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale: Chance of dozing while sitting and reading
description: How likely are you to doze off or fall asleep in the following situations, in contrast to feeling just tired? This refers to your usual way of life in recent times. Even if you have not done some of these things recently, try to work out how they would have affected you. Use the following scale to choose the most appropriate number for each situation: Sitting and reading

display_name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale: Chance of dozing while watching TV
description: How likely are you to doze off or fall asleep in the following situations, in contrast to feeling just tired? This refers to your usual way of life in recent times. Even if you have not done some of these things recently, try to work out how they would have affected you. Use the following scale to choose the most appropriate number for each situation: Watching TV

display_name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale: Chance of dozing while sitting, inactive in a public place
description: How likely are you to doze off or fall asleep in the following situations, in contrast to feeling just tired? This refers to your usual way of life in recent times. Even if you have not done some of these things recently, try to work out how they would have affected you. Use the following scale to choose the most appropriate number for each situation:  Sitting, inactive in a public place (e.g. a theater or a meeting)

display_name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale: Chance of dozing as a passenger in a car for an hour without a break
description: How likely are you to doze off or fall asleep in the following situations, in contrast to feeling just tired? This refers to your usual way of life in recent times. Even if you have not done some of these things recently, try to work out how they would have affected you. Use the following scale to choose the most appropriate number for each situation:  As a passenger in a car for an hour without a break

display_name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale: Chance of dozing while lying down to rest in the afternoon when circumstances permit
description: How likely are you to doze off or fall asleep in the following situations, in contrast to feeling just tired? This refers to your usual way of life in recent times. Even if you have not done some of these things recently, try to work out how they would have affected you. Use the following scale to choose the most appropriate number for each situation:  Lying down to rest in the afternoon when circumstances permit

display_name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale: Chance of dozing while sitting and talking to someone
description: How likely are you to doze off or fall asleep in the following situations, in contrast to feeling just tired? This refers to your usual way of life in recent times. Even if you have not done some of these things recently, try to work out how they would have affected you. Use the following scale to choose the most appropriate number for each situation:  Sitting and talking to someone

display_name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale: Chance of dozing while sitting quietly after lunch without alcohol
description: How likely are you to doze off or fall asleep in the following situations, in contrast to feeling just tired? This refers to your usual way of life in recent times. Even if you have not done some of these things recently, try to work out how they would have affected you. Use the following scale to choose the most appropriate number for each situation:  Sitting quietly after a lunch without alcohol

display_name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale: Chance of dozing while in a car, while stopped for a few minutes in the traffic
description: How likely are you to doze off or fall asleep in the following situations, in contrast to feeling just tired? This refers to your usual way of life in recent times. Even if you have not done some of these things recently, try to work out how they would have affected you. Use the following scale to choose the most appropriate number for each situation:  In a car, while stopped for a few minutes in the traffic
Calculated - Total score based on an 8-item questionnaires ranking likelihood of dozing off Johns MW 1991 (PubMed ID: 1798888). Scale 0-3 for individual items; 0 to 24 for overall score.
calculation: ess_total = ess_1sitread + ess_2watchingtv + ess_3sitinactive + ess_4passenger + ess_5lyingdown + ess_6sittalk + ess_7afterlunch + ess_8stoppedcar

display_name: Sleep efficiency (%): the proportion of sleep duration in in-bed period
description: Sleep duration is the interval between sleep onset time and lights on/out-bed time while asleep, while in-bed period is the interval between lights off/in-bed time and lights on/out-bed time. Conventionally, this variable could be described as the ratio between total sleep time (TST) and time in bed (TIB).

display_name: Sleep latency: the interval between lights-out/in-bed time and sleep onset time.
description: Time to first epoch of sleep

display_name: Total sleep duration: the interval between sleep onset time and lights on/out-bed time while asleep
description: Conventionally it's also referred to as "total sleep time". It does not include wake after sleep onset.

Total time spent in REM sleep

display_name: Wake after sleep onset (WASO) : the total duration between sleep onset and lights-on/out-bed time while being awake.
